Key Match Events: Derrick White scored 13 points in the fourth quarter, including a fadeaway bank-shot dagger that put Boston ahead by eight points with two minutes remaining.
Post-Match Reflections: Derrick White expressed that he hadn't been pleased with his recent shooting performances but seemed to have his swagger back for this game.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Jaylen Brown was out with a right shoulder strain.
Others: Derrick White contributed 2 rebounds, 2 assists, and 2 blocks in 37 minutes of action.
